answers.answer: You should not have sex when your wife has a yeast infection.  Yes, men can get it too.  Basically it is like jock itch.  Treat it with an antifungal like Lotrimin cream.  Your wife needs treatment too.If she had to take antibiotics, that would have caused the yeast.  Other causes are diabetes, consuming too much sugar and starches, not having clean hands before touching her.  Birth control pills can make it easier to get.She will need an antifungal; for women there are creams or a tablet called Diflucan.   She can also take a probiotic and avoid sugar.

question: Hi Doctor,I have painless spots of rashes on my penis. It looks like ringworm but not circular. I want to believe I got it after having sex with my wife. During sex I see a creamy cheese like fluid that comes out but have not discuss it with her or our doctor. Can it be that causing my rash?
title: RASH ON MY PENIS
